name: Accessing Customer Portals
title: Accessing Customer Portals
body:
Overview

Users may encounter difficulties when trying to access EFS portals (namely URL's ending in /portal/manager). Despite having access to the backend /www URLs, you may find that you don't have the same access in the actual customer Portals.

Information

By default, users do not have access to these portals. To gain access, a user must be set up for the specific portal. In many cases, a user may already be set up by the Professional Services (PS) team. To log in as this panelist to the portal, follow the steps provided below:

Â 

FAQ

Q: How can I be set up as a panelist for a specific portal?
A: In many cases, a user may already be set up by the PS team. If not, you will need to contact them to be set up.

Q: What if my email is not associated with an account on these portals?
A: You will need to be set up as a panelist for the specific portal. Contact the PS team for assistance.
